name: Doki Doki Sweet Dreams
storyline: This mod is a presentation of the Sayonika character created by fans of the game!
summary: Doki Doki: Sweet Dreams is a heartwarming yet bittersweet Doki Doki Literature Club! mod that explores themes of comfort, nostalgia, and second chances. Unlike the original game’s unsettling twists, this mod focuses on an emotional journey where the protagonist experiences a dreamlike world where they can reconnect with the Literature Club members in a way that feels both peaceful and surreal.
